channel.title: Eye on the Sky: Daily Forecasts
channel.description: Current daily forecast plus two weeks.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 15, 2017
item.description: Sun filtering through increasing clouds west late this afternoon. Slight chance of a shower in the Upper Hudson Valley and Lake George region of New York. Highs in the low to mid 70s east, mid 70s to around 80 west. Light winds, variable to southeast, except from the east at around 10 mph in the St. Lawrence Valley.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 14, 2017
item.description: Mostly sunny and pleasant. Highs from the mid 60s to around 70 north, low to mid 70s south, with some upper 70s possible in the Hudson and Connecticut Valleys. North winds around 10 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 13, 2017
item.description: Mostly cloudy north; increasing clouds south. Slight chance of a shower or thunderstorm, and slight chance of a severe storm far south. Temperatures from the mid 70s to around 80 north, 80s to around 90 south. Winds becoming northwest at 5 to 15 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 12, 2017
item.description: Mostly sunny south; mostly to partly sunny north. Very slight chance of a shower or thunderstorm near the Québec border; slight chance of a severe storm is far northern new Hampshire. Highs in the mid to upper 80s in southern Québec, upper 80s to lower 90s elsewhere, except low to mid 90s in the Champlain, Hudson, and Connecticut Valleys. West to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 11, 2017
item.description: Mostly sunny north and west, decreasing clouds south and east. Isolated late day showers or thunderstorms near the international border. Highs in the low to mid 80s northeast and in the Adirondacks, mainly mid to upper 80s elsewhere, with lower 90s in the broad valleys west, and in the Connecticut Valley. West to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 10, 2017
item.description: Becoming partly cloudy. Widely scattered, mainly PM showers and thunderstorms from the Adirondacks and RT 2 southward. Highs 73-83. Light, variable wind becoming west to southwest 5-10 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 9, 2017
item.description: Mostly cloudy this morning, with scattered showers increasing through the Adirondacks, northeast into northern areas, likely mid-morning to early afternoon from the northern Green Mountains east. Clouds breaking for some sun west to east this afternoon, with a chance of a few passing showers or a thunderstorm. Highs in the 70s west, in the upper 60s to low 70s east. Light winds becoming west near 10 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 8, 2017
item.description: Sunshine becoming increasingly filtering through clouds from south to north, with the slight chance of a shower or thunderstorm, mainly over high terrain north and over the southern Greens. Highs from the mid 70s to around 80. Light winds, variable to southwest.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 7, 2017
item.description: Mostly sunny and pleasant this afternoon. Highs in the low to mid 70s. Winds from the north at 5 to 10 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 6, 2017
item.description: Rain diminishing in southern Québec and far northern New Hampshire, remaining likely elsewhere. Temperatures nearly steady in the upper 40s to mid 50s, except mid 50s to around 60 near and north of the Québec border. Northeast winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph in the St. Lawrence Valley.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 5, 2017
item.description: Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers, numerous in New York and in southern Québec. Slight chance of a thunderstorm south and west of Interstate 89. Temperatures nearly steady in the mid to upper 50s east of the Greens and from the Adirondacks into southern Québec, and lower 60s in the Hudson and Champlain Valleys. Winds 10 to 15 mph, from the northeast in the St. Lawrence Valley, otherwise southeast, and possibly gusting to 40 mph along the western slopes of the Green Mountains.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 4, 2017
item.description: Increasing clouds. Rising chance for rain or showers south and west. Highs 58-68—warmest northeast. Light, variable wind becoming south 10 mph or less.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 3, 2017
item.description: Partly to mostly cloudy, quite cool. Scattered, mainly mountain showers north; isolated hilltop showers south. Highs 53-61 north, 58-66 south. Northwest wind 8-15 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 2, 2017
item.description: Mostly cloudy, with limited breaks of sun through the north and southern mountains, with scattered afternoon showers. Variable clouds and sun with a few localized showers in southern valleys. Highs in the mid 50s to mid 60s north to south, a few low 50s in the northern mountains. West to northwest winds 10 to 15 mph.

item.title: Daily Forecast: June 1, 2017
item.description: Mostly to partly sunny in southern valleys and in the Champlain Valley. Mostly cloudy in Québec, the northern mountains, and southern Greens. Widely scattered showers. Highs from the mid 60s to around 70, some lower 70s in southern valleys, and low to mid 60s from the Adirondacks into southern Québec. West winds 10 to 15 mph, a few gusts to 25 mph.
